## ProgramBuilder.textureDimensions() method

Same as textureSize builtin function in GLSL and textureDimensions builtin function in WGSL, only valid for WebGL2 device and WebGPU device

**Signature:**

```typescript
textureDimensions(tex: PBShaderExp, level?: number | PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tex | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
|  level | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)
